snippet: The suspect accused of building bombs used in the 2002 Bali nightclub attacks apologized to victims on Monday, and said in court testimony that he had opposed the bombings.
abstract: Umar Patek, terrorism suspect accused of building bombs used in the 2002 Bali nightclub attacks, apologizes to victims in court testimony, saying that he opposed the bombings but was afraid of more senior members in the Qaeda-linked Jemaah Islamiyah network.
lead_paragraph: The suspect accused of building bombs used in the 2002 Bali nightclub attacks apologized to victims on Monday, and said in court testimony that he had opposed the bombings.

headline.main: Indonesia: Bali Bombing Suspect Apologizes for 2002 Attacks
headline.print_headline: Indonesia: Bali Bombing Suspect Apologizes for 2002 Attacks
